value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SNU-6EM43Ao" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Show Total in Stacked Bar and Column Chart in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this video, we will learn how we can show total value in a stacked bar chart and stacked column chart in Power BI. Earlier to show the total value in stacked bar chart and column chart we need to use some alternative approach. Now, with this new Power BI update, you can easily show Total by turn

value.title: Small Multiples in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session on Small Multiples in Power BI. “Small Multiples”- a new feature rolled out during December 2020 Power BI Desktop Update. Small Multiples is available as a Preview feature at this moment. This is a very cool feature we can use with our stacked bar and column charts,

value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI.  This feature has been rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.  Here, first we will learn how we can create apply a sort for the multiple column. Then we will change the sort

value.title: Use Page Navigation Action for Button to Navigate from One Page to Another in Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, about newly introduced action type for buttons which is “Page Navigation”. Sometimes we have a requirement where we need to redirect the user from one page to another page by clicking on the button.   Previously we can achieve this requirement using Bookmark and selection
